RT @SenTedCruz Christmas is a joyous and hopeful season, where we celebrate the birth of Jesus Christ and the promise of his salvation. The Prince of Peace, born in Bethlehem, came so that we may know Him and his enduring love, joy, and redemption.
Merry Christmas to you and your family! Hope your day is filled with peace, happiness, and good times with loved ones.

and we saw his glory, the glory as of the Father’s only Son,full of grace and truth.

May the reason for the season inspire us to celebrate redeeming, unconditional love and also practice it.

May we serve the poor, relieve suffering, welcome the stranger, visit the imprisoned and love our neighbor.
